aboutTxtId.en_US: Someone who was borned to be passionate to accept challenges and expanding skills and abilities. Friendly and was called once a phlegmatic.

softwareSystemDeveloperDescTxtId.en_US: Very interested with programming and developing softwares and apps.

degreeValueTxtId.en_US: Bachelor of Information Technology (Honours) in Software Systems Development

hobbyOneTxtId.en_US: Have a hobby to write my own apps and softwares to make my life easier. Interested in learning Ethical Hacking with Kali Linux.

hobbyTwoTxtId.en_US: Play alot of sports, badminton, pingpong, squash, jungle tracking, to get healthier. Gets addicted recently to Scuba Diving to get closer to the mother nature.
